data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Jans Token Pack 37 - Guards and Soldiers
data.detailed_description:
Jans Token Pack 37 - Guards and Soldiers

Guards!" . This is usually a signal for your characters to come in to jump into action to help someone that is in trouble. But occasionally your characters are the ones that are causing a villager to yell out for aid. Maybe one of your characters made an attempt to steal something but failed, or maybe your characters were attacked and are spotted near the corpse of the assassin.
This top-down token pack offers guards and soldiers to populate your towns and villages.
This package consists of:
  • Peasant Soldier Male
  • Spearman Male
  • Archer Male
  • Swordsman
  • Crossbowman Male
  • Halberdier Male
  • Warhorse
  • Guard Dog
  • Knight Male
  • Templar Male
  • Guard Sitting Male
  • Royal Guard Female
  • Mage Guard Female
  • Archer Female
  • Guard Wounded Male
The tokens come in multiple color/weapon variations.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Jan Loos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
